name: JuhannusOlumppialaiset C64
description:
-- MIDSUMMER OLUMPICS C64--

CHECK OUT THE ORIGINAL NES GAME HERE!

It’s time for a competition!
                                           
The four Finland’s toughest midsummer celebrants are competing each other in the most ultimate triathlon like never before! Their mental and physical skills are put to a real test as they hoard alcohol for guzzling and try to stay alive. Which one of them is the one this year, who manages stay in balance and remain above the surface until the end?

3 trilling events up to 3 players

4 characters with different abilities to choose from

A safe way to practice dangerous midsummer activities

A Commodore 64 version of a homebrew game ”JuhannusOlumppialaiset 2017” developed by AasiPelit for Nintendo Entertainment System.
